title: Image Classification and Segmentation Concepts
description: Introduction to the fundamental concepts of image classification and segmentation using the EuroSAT dataset. Students explore how pixel-wise prediction differs from classification, examine key segmentation architectures like U-Net and SegNet, and apply these ideas to aerial imagery such as the Dubai Segmentation dataset.
